name: Trump the Jumpy President - Pole Vault Edition
name_original: Trump the Jumpy President - Pole Vault Edition
description: Play the best Pole Vault game in the world! Trump the Jumpy President - Pole Vault Edition will challenge you to beat your best score and BEAT YOUR FRIENDS BEST SCORE! Forever FREE, this app is just for you, for your entertainment. Jump from rock to rock, avoid those evil birds or pop them and watch out of those nasty bombs! Trump the Jumpy President - Pole Vault Edition features challenging physics based game-play and hours of fun and adventures! You will need logic, skill and bravery to achieve the best scores and challenge your friends!
